mapper.select: select subcategory_id, category_name from subcategory where maincategory_id = #{maincategoryNo}
select maincategory_id, category_name from maincategory where maincategory_id != 999

SELECT s.subcategory_id, s.category_name, s.maincategory_id, m.category_name AS maincategory_name, COALESCE(COUNT(c.subcategory_id), 0) AS count FROM subcategory s LEFT JOIN maincategory m ON s.maincategory_id = m.maincategory_id LEFT JOIN collection c ON s.subcategory_id = c.subcategory_id WHERE s.subcategory_id = #{no}

SELECT m.maincategory_id, m.category_name AS maincategory_name, s.subcategory_id, s.category_name, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN c.subcategory_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS count FROM maincategory m LEFT JOIN subcategory s ON m.maincategory_id = s.maincategory_id LEFT OUTER JOIN collection c ON s.subcategory_id = c.subcategory_id WHERE m.maincategory_id = #{no} GROUP BY m.maincategory_id, m.category_name, s.subcategory_id, s.category_name ORDER BY s.subcategory_id

SELECT NULL AS subcategory_id, NULL AS category_name, m.maincategory_id, m.category_name AS maincategory_name, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN c.subcategory_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS count FROM maincategory m LEFT JOIN subcategory s ON m.maincategory_id = s.maincategory_id LEFT JOIN collection c ON s.subcategory_id = c.subcategory_id GROUP BY m.maincategory_id, m.category_name
UNION ALL
SELECT s.subcategory_id, s.category_name, s.maincategory_id, m.category_name AS maincategory_name, COALESCE(COUNT(c.subcategory_id), 0) AS count FROM subcategory s LEFT JOIN maincategory m ON s.maincategory_id = m.maincategory_id LEFT JOIN collection c ON s.subcategory_id = c.subcategory_id GROUP BY s.subcategory_id, s.category_name, s.maincategory_id, m.category_name
ORDER BY subcategory_id, maincategory_id LIMIT #{pageNo}, #{pageCount}

SELECT m.maincategory_id, m.category_name, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN c.subcategory_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS count FROM maincategory m LEFT JOIN subcategory s ON m.maincategory_id = s.maincategory_id LEFT JOIN collection c ON s.subcategory_id = c.subcategory_id GROUP BY m.maincategory_id, m.category_name ORDER BY maincategory_id LIMIT #{pageNo}, #{pageCount}
select (select count(*) from maincategory) + (select count(*) from subcategory) as count
